title: Debitor - can't set credit max on new debitor
text: When creating a new debitor on POS, you need to give the debitor a number and a name. Otherwise it won't accept a credit max.
description: When creating a new debitor on POS, you need to give the debitor a number and a name. Otherwise it won't accept a credit max.

title: Debitor - change
text: If the customer wants to change the name or any other aspect of a debitor, they have to ask whoever is in charge of their finanses to do that through their financial system. We cannot do it. They can create a new debitor on the POS, but they cannot change or delete it from the POS.
description:
If the customer wants to change the name or any other aspect of a debitor, they have to ask whoever is in charge of their finanses to do that through their financial system. 

  

We cannot do it. 

  

They can create a new debitor on the POS, but they cannot change or delete it from the POS.

title: Debitor – remove from POS
text: We can't do that. This has to be done through the customers own financial system.
description: We can't do that. This has to be done through the customers own financial system.

title: Debitorer – file layout
text: The file name is optional, must consist of a file name of up to 30 characters and an extension of 3 characters. The file name must be the same for each transfer. Fields are separated by commas. Note that only text fields should be surrounded by quotation marks ("text") and numeric fields must not be surrounded by quotation marks. File structure: Account Number (Numeric 10 Customer account number (without quotation marks) Name (Alpha 30) Customer's name (surrounded by quotation marks) Att. (Alpha 30) Attention of (surrounded by quotation marks) Address 1 (Alpha 30) Customer's address 1 (surrounded by quotation marks) Address 2 (Alpha 30) Customer's address 2 (surrounded by quotation marks) Postal Code/City (Alpha 30) Postal code and city (surrounded by quotation marks) Credit Maximum (Numeric N7.2) Credit maximum. Decimal point: period (without quotation marks) Balance Customer's balance. Decimal point: period (without quotation marks). See the section on balance Balance Positive balance = "debit entry" – the customer owes money to the store. Negative balance = "credit entry" – the customer has money owed to them by the store
description:
The file name is optional, must consist of a file name of up to 30 characters and an extension of 3 characters.


The file name must be the same for each transfer.


Fields are separated by commas. Note that only text fields should be surrounded by quotation marks ("text") and numeric fields must not be surrounded by quotation marks.


File structure:

Account Number (Numeric 10    Customer account number (without quotation marks) 

Name (Alpha 30)                         Customer's name (surrounded by quotation marks) 

Att. (Alpha 30)                             Attention of (surrounded by quotation marks) 

Address 1 (Alpha 30)                   Customer's address 1 (surrounded by quotation marks) 

Address 2 (Alpha 30)                   Customer's address 2 (surrounded by quotation marks) 

Postal Code/City (Alpha 30)         Postal code and city (surrounded by quotation marks) 

Credit Maximum (Numeric N7.2) Credit maximum. Decimal point: period (without quotation marks) 

Balance                                         Customer's balance. Decimal point: period (without quotation marks). 

                                                      See the section on balance


Balance Positive balance = "debit entry" – the customer owes money to the store. 

Negative balance = "credit entry" – the customer has money owed to them by the store

title: Debitor file upload
text: Task description Kopiér C5 - KPW Task number 86 Debitor fil has to be uploaded according to Task 86 in support tools. File name debitor and file extension csv The fil can also be uploaded directly to the POS, by putting the file in into "send_til_kasse" folder for that particular POS. File name debitor and file extension $$$
description:
Task description    Kopiér C5 - KPW

Task number         86


Debitor fil has to be uploaded according to Task 86 in support tools. File name debitor and file extension csv   


The fil can also be uploaded directly to the POS, by putting the file in into "send_til_kasse" folder for that particular POS.

File name debitor and file extension $$$

title: Debitor-balance on screen.
text: The store sometime contact support regarding the query that they want to see debitor balance on the screen. when they click on a debitor on POS,so they should see the balance regarding that debitor. This feature can be activated in DdD admin by searching the following parameter and change its value from 0 to 1 as shown. DdD admin-->Advanced configuration Save it and make a reload on the POS.Now the information regarding specific debitor will be visible as shown below.
description:
The store sometime contact support regarding the query that they want to see debitor balance on the screen.
when they click on a debitor on POS,so they should see the balance regarding that debitor.

This feature can be activated in DdD admin by searching the following parameter and change its value from 0 to 1 as shown.

DdD admin-->Advanced configuration



Save it and make a reload on the POS.Now the information regarding specific debitor will be visible as shown below.
